Warez-Host.Com ★ Offshore VPS Hosting in Europe ★ Online Support ★ Managed Servers

Hi All

We are at Warez-Host Wishing you a happy and Magical New Year. We hope it brings you lots of joy and happiness.

All the best

Warez-Host was founded in 2007 and offering quality, reliable and affordable offshore vps hosting.
We have a rock solid infrastructure in place and guaranteed to serve you the next several years to come.

Warez-Host tailored standard VPS Server plans to the needs web application developers, businesses, and web hosting resellers.

All servers are fully managed by our Expert Team according to your request.


VPS Features:
* Dual Processor Xeon E5-2440 v2 Servers, 48GB RAM DDR3
* Dual Processor Xeon E5-2620 v2 Servers, 64GB RAM DDR3
* Solid State Disk (SSD Servers)
* Over 9 Years of Experience in the Hosting Industry
* 24x7x365 Premium Support
* Live Chat Support
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* 1Gbps Uplink Port
* Full Root Access
* Competitive pricing
* Fully Managed Servers
* OpenVZ/Xen Virtualizations
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Real rDNS
* 24x7 Monitoring


Network & Facilities:
* Fast, Secure and Stable Network
* High Performance Servers inside Our Private Colocation of Europe
* Choice of Network Location: Netherlands / Bulgaria / Sweden / Russia

Warez-Host.Com Celebrate this New Year by Offering 15% Discount on VPS Plans for lifetime. This Special Offer is valid until 28 February, 2018
